markdownRemark.html:
Check Date

Works on 2019-03-19 14:32:49+0800 System Version macOS 10.13.6

Question

How to fix “Pseudo-terminal will not be allocated because stdin is not a terminal”?

Answer

with option -T from manual: Disable pseudo-tty allocation

Reference

  • https://stackoverflow.com/questions/7114990/pseudo-terminal-will-not-be-allocated-because-stdin-is-not-a-terminal

frontmatter.title: Pseudo Terminal Will Not Be Allocated Because Stdin Is Not A Terminal
